1.text: So these three men stopped answering Job, because he was righteous in his own eyes.

2.text: This kindled the anger of Elihu son of Barachel the Buzite, of the family of Ram. He burned with anger against Job for justifying himself rather than God,

3.text: and he burned with anger against Job’s three friends because they had failed to refute Job, and yet had condemned him.

4.text: Now Elihu had waited to speak to Job because the others were older than he.

5.text: But when he saw that the three men had no further reply, his anger was kindled.

6.text: So Elihu son of Barachel the Buzite declared: “I am young in years, while you are old; that is why I was timid and afraid to tell you what I know.

7.text: I thought that age should speak, and many years should teach wisdom.

8.text: But there is a spirit in a man, the breath of the Almighty, that gives him understanding.

9.text: It is not only the old who are wise, or the elderly who understand justice.

10.text: Therefore I say, ‘Listen to me; I too will declare what I know.’

11.text: Indeed, I waited while you spoke; I listened to your reasoning; as you searched for words,

12.text: I paid you full attention. But no one proved Job wrong; not one of you rebutted his arguments.

13.text: So do not claim, ‘We have found wisdom; let God, not man, refute him.’

14.text: But Job has not directed his words against me, and I will not answer him with your arguments.

15.text: Job’s friends are dismayed, with no more to say; words have escaped them.

16.text: Must I wait, now that they are silent, now that they stand and no longer reply?

17.text: I too will answer; yes, I will declare what I know.

18.text: For I am full of words, and my spirit within me compels me.

19.text: Behold, my belly is like unvented wine; it is about to burst like a new wineskin.

20.text: I must speak and find relief; I must open my lips and respond.

21.text: I will be partial to no one, nor will I flatter any man.

22.text: For I do not know how to flatter, or my Maker would remove me in an instant.
